definition[0]: a small quantity of a drug that increases the effect of one that was given before, so that someone continues to be protected against a disease
definition[1]: something that helps someone or something to increase or improve, or to be more successful or confident
example[2]: a profit booster for the company
example[3]: Mail from home is a big morale booster for faraway troops.
definition[2]: a rocket that is used to provide extra power for a spacecraft to leave the Earth
definition[3]: someone who gives a lot of support to a person, organization, or idea
